meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Baltmanis Jim McGinnis Suzanne Koppelman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7797.

td.p: Dave Baltmanis, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois
Jim McGinnis, a delivery driver and part-time actor from Beaver, Pennsylvania
Suzanne Koppelman, a museum education manager from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,401)

tr.td: FIRST THING IN THE MORNING
A NICE CUP OF COFFEE
TV MOVIES?
NOBEL PRIZE KNOWLEDGE
STATE CAPITAL COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
(Alex: We'll give you the university or the college; you name the state capital for us.)
"F" STOP

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Dave: What is a beer?)

a shower

JimDave
')
